Wow, worked for me!  SOoooo happy.  Its really easy to do. I was overthinking it too much at first but its simple. Unzip all files to desktop, the second file didnt seem to unzip anything??...  But then I ran the update, then stuck the three files in Library>Application Support>ProApps folder and voila!  No more Serial!!!!!  Yesssss! Mainstage back on just before rehearsal tonight!  Saweet!  xD
call me a noob, but i cant work out how to use this, .rar files i have never opened before? what do i do with these? please explain :)
@ pro-jekt, just download unrarx @ unrarx.com and click the logo to download. Then just open the .rar files and it will automaticly extract. It's just a .zip file but now it is an .rar compression.
This worked fine on my 9.1.4, no more serial ....
